Set.Text: [ICON_Bullet]The [ICON_DISTRICT_CITY_CENTER] City Center.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Faith] Faith.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Russia, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLY_SITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer point.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Using a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person's [ICON_Ability] Ability in the City borders acquires a new [ICON_Culture] Tile.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Science] Science.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Korea, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_CAMPUS] Campus.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Science] Science.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]6 [ICON_Gold] Gold Maintenance.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Adjacent [ICON_Charges] Farms gain +1 [ICON_Food] Food.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Adjacent [ICON_Charges] Mines gain +1 [ICON_Science] Science.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Science] Science bonus decreases from adjacent [ICON_District] Districts.

[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Unique to the Maya, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_CAMPUS] Campus.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Science] Science.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Does not gain adjacency from sources that would effect the [ICON_DISTRICT_CAMPUS] Campus; major adjacency from [ICON_Charges] Plantations and minor adjacency from [ICON_Charges] Farms.
[ICON_Bullet]Cannot be adjacent to the City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Unit] Military Units and [ICON_Production] Production.

[ICON_Bullet]Cannot be adjacent to the City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Unique to Zulu, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_ENCAMPMENT] Encampment.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Unit] Military Units and [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+25% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Corps] Corps and [ICON_Army] Armies.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Corps] Corps and [ICON_Army] Armies can be produced without a [ICON_Buildings] Military Academy.

[ICON_Bullet]Cannot be adjacent to the City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Unique to Vietnam, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_ENCAMPMENT] Encampment.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Unit] Military Units and [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Does not gain [ICON_Production] Production from adjacency; gains [ICON_Culture] Culture from adjacency.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Major [ICON_Culture] Culture adjacency to [ICON_District] Districts.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gains [ICON_Tourism] Tourism at the [ICON_Science] Flight Technology.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Is not a [ICON_District] Specialty District and does not require [ICON_Citizen] Population.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Unit] Naval Units, maritime yields, and [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]No [ICON_Movement] Movement penalty for embarking and disembarking on the [ICON_District] District's tile.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Must be built on [ICON_Terrain] Coast or Lake adjacent to land.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to England, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_HARBOR] Harbor.[NEWLINE][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Unit] Naval Units, maritime yields, and [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]No [ICON_Movement] Movement penalty for embarking and disembarking on the [ICON_District] District's tile.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Must be built on [ICON_Terrain] Coast or Lake adjacent to land.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for [ICON_Unit] Naval Units produced in the City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral points.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty in Cities on [ICON_Terrain] Continents other than the [ICON_Capital] Capital's.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Phoenicia, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_HARBOR] Harbor.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Unit] Naval Units, maritime yields, and [ICON_Science] Science.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Must be built on [ICON_Terrain] Coast or Lake tiles adjacenct to land.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gains [ICON_Science] Science from various adjacencies.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Settlers in the City.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Unit] Aircraft Units and [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Unit] Aircraft capacity.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built on [ICON_Terrain] Hills.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Mali, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB] Commercial Hub.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Major adjacency to [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLY_SITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]20% [ICON_Gold] Gold and [ICON_Faith] Faith discount on all purchases in the City.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built in the same City as a [ICON_DISTRICT_ENTERTAINMENT] Water Park.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built in the same City as a [ICON_DISTRICT_ENTERTAINMENT] Water Park.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Brazil, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_ENTERTAINMENT_COMPLEX] Entertainment Complex.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City can produce the [ICON_GreatPerson] Carnival Project.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built in the same City as a [ICON_DISTRICT_ENTERTAINMENT] Copacabana.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Byzantium, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_ENTERTAINMENT_COMPLEX] Entertainment Complex.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built in the same City as a [ICON_DISTRICT_ENTERTAINMENT] Water Park.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]3 [ICON_Gold] Gold Maintenance.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Spawns a [ICON_Unit] Heavy Cavalry class Unit when the [ICON_District] District or [ICON_Buildings] Buildings pertaining to the [ICON_District] District are complete; [ICON_Unit] Units spawned do not cost [ICON_Resource_Iron] Strategic Resources.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Must be built on [ICON_Terrain] Coast or Lake tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built in the same City as a [ICON_DISTRICT_ENTERTAINMENT] Entertainment Complex.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_District] District dedicated to producing [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Must be built on [ICON_Terrain] Coast or Lake tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built in the same City as a [ICON_DISTRICT_ENTERTAINMENT] Entertainment Complex.

[ICON_Bullet]District dedicated to producing [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Greece, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theater Square.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]District dedicated to producing [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Major adjacency to the [ICON_DISTRICT_CITY_CENTER] City Center.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain 1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy when completed.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Must be built on [ICON_Terrain] Hills.

Set.Text: [ICON_Bullet]District dedicated to producing [ICON_Production] Production.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Germany, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE] Industrial Zone.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]District dedicated to producing [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Major adjacency to [ICON_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB] Commercial Hub.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Standard adjacency to [ICON_Charges] Resources.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Gaul, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE] Industrial Zone.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]District dedicated to producing [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Major adjacency to [ICON_Charges] Quarries and [ICON_Resource_Iron] Strategic Resources.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Unlocked at the [ICON_Science] Iron Working Technology.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Earn the [ICON_Science] Apprenticeship Technology when completed.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gains [ICON_Strength] City Defenses.

[ICON_Bullet]Provides the City with a source of [ICON_Housing] Fresh Water from an adjacent [ICON_Terrain] River, Lake, Oasis, or Mountain tile.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+6 [ICON_Housing] Housing in Cities without [ICON_Housing] Fresh Water.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Housing] Housing in Cities which already had [ICON_Housing] Fresh Water.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity if adjacent to a [ICON_Terrain] Geothermal Fissure.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Prevents [ICON_Food] Food loss during Drought.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Certain adjacent [ICON_Charges] Improvements or [ICON_District] Districts gain [ICON_Food] Food adjacency.

[ICON_Bullet]Provides the City with a source of [ICON_Housing] Fresh Water from an adjacent [ICON_Terrain] River, Lake, Oasis, or Mountain tile.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+6 [ICON_Housing] Housing in Cities without [ICON_Housing] Fresh Water.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Housing] Housing in Cities which already had [ICON_Housing] Fresh Water.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity if adjacent to a [ICON_Terrain] Geothermal Fissure.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Prevents [ICON_Food] Food loss during Drought.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Certain adjacent [ICON_Charges] Improvements or [ICON_District] Districts gain [ICON_Food] Food adjacency.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Rome, replaces the [ICON_District_Aqueduct] Aqueduct.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Provides the City with a source of [ICON_Housing] Fresh Water from an adjacent [ICON_Terrain] River, Lake, Oasis, or Mountain tile.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+6 [ICON_Housing] Housing in Cities without [ICON_Housing] Fresh Water.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Housing] Housing in Cities which already had [ICON_Housing] Fresh Water.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity and +2 [ICON_Housing] Housing in any City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity if adjacent to a [ICON_Terrain] Geothermal Fissure.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Prevents [ICON_Food] Food loss during Drought.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Certain adjacent [ICON_Charges] Improvements or [ICON_District] Districts gain [ICON_Food] Food adjacency.

[ICON_Bullet]Breathtaking Appeal: +6 [ICON_Housing] Housing.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Charming Appeal: +5 [ICON_Housing] Housing.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Average Appeal: +4 [ICON_Housing] Housing.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Uninviting Appeal: +3 [ICON_Housing] Housing.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Disgusting Appeal: +2 [ICON_Housing] Housing.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Certain [ICON_Charges] Improvements and [ICON_District] Districts gain or give [ICON_Food] Food adjacency.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Kongo, replaces the [ICON_DISTRICT_NEIGHBORHOOD] Neighborhood.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Food] Food, +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold, and +5 [ICON_Housing] Housing.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Must be built on [ICON_Terrain] Forest or Rainforest.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Certain [ICON_Charges] Improvements and [ICON_District] Districts gain or give [ICON_Food] Food adjacency.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Naval Units and [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes can pass through as if the tile were [ICON_Terrain] Coast or Lake.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain bonus [ICON_Gold] Gold if passing through.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Military Engineers can spend a [ICON_Charges] Charge to complete 20% of a [ICON_DISTRICT_CANAL] Canal's [ICON_Production] Production cost.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Housing] Housing.

[ICON_Bullet]Must be built on a [ICON_Terrain] Floodplains tile, where the River is adjacent to 2 Floodplains tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Flooding does not [ICON_Damaged] Damage tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Yields from Flooding decreases by 50%.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Prevents [ICON_Food] Food loss during Drought.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]A series of [ICON_Terrain] Floodplains on a River can support only one [ICON_DISTRICT_DAM] Dam.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit]Military Engineers can spend a [ICON_Charges] Charge to complete 20% of a [ICON_DISTRICT_DAM] Dam's [ICON_Production] Production cost.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+6 [ICON_Housing] Housing.

[ICON_Bullet]+8 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty for the City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District]Specialty Districts gain standard adjacency from the [ICON_DISTRICT_GOVERNMENT] Government Plaza.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Governor] Governor Title when completed.

[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor per Delegation or Embassy from a foreign Civilization.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy when built next to a [ICON_DISTRICT_CITY_CENTER] City Center.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Enemy [ICON_VisTopSecret] Spies operate at 2 levels lower when targeting the [ICON_DISTRICT_GOVERNMENT] Diplomatic Quarter and adjacent [ICON_District] Districts.

[ICON_Bullet]Cannot be adjacent to the City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing on Charming Appeal tiles; bonus tripled to +3 [ICON_Housing] Housing on Breathtaking Appeal tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 Appeal on adjacent tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Culture] Culture Bombs adjacent unclaimed tiles.
[ICON_Bullet]Required for [ICON_Science] Space Exploration Projects.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built on [ICON_Terrain] Hills.
